section.title: Print Production Entry Sheet
section.para: To print a Production entry sheet, select the "Print Production Entry Sheet" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing a Production entry sheet, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to print a Production entry sheet for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse you want to print Production entry sheet for.
Production entered on or after this date will be included in the report.
Production entered on or before this date will be included in the report.
Select Form definition you want to use for the report.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without generating a report, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
